jsx.http.rpc.remote.client
Class CException

java.lang.Object
  jsx.http.rpc.remote.Objective
      jsx.http.rpc.remote.client.CObject
          jsx.http.rpc.remote.client.CException

public class CException
extends CObject

A client reflection to java.lang.Exception with the help of Reflector.

Note that a object of this class is an Objective at client-side in that when finalized it automatically tries to asynchronously dereference its server-side entity.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

                     Remote remote)

Since:
1.0
Method Detail

create

public static CException create(Reflector reflector,
                                Remote remote)

Synchronously creates a CException reflection from a Remote object with a Reflector.

This method synchronously increases server-side references to the Remote object.

Parameters:
reflector - The Reflector object associated with the CException object being constructed.
remote - The underlying Remote object associated with the CException object being constructed.
Returns:
The created CException reflection.
Since:
1.0

create

public static void create(Reflector reflector,
                          Remote remote,
                          Returnable<CException> rt)

Asynchronously creates a CException reflection from a Remote object with a Reflector.

This method asynchronously increases server-side references to the Remote object.

Parameters:
reflector - The Reflector object associated with the CException object being constructed.
remote - The underlying Remote object associated with the CException object being constructed.
rt - A Returnable to return the created CException reflection.
Since:
1.0
